downloadTitle: Forefront Unified Access Gateway (UAG) Content Series- Exchange Services Publishing Solution Guide
downloadDescription: Forefront UAG Content Series - Exchange Services Publishing Solution Guide
detailsSection: You can use Forefront UAG to provide remote access to Microsoft Exchange Server mail services, including Outlook Web Access, Outlook Anywhere (RPC-over-HTTP), and Exchange ActiveSync. This solution guide provides an overview of Exchange publishing, a summary of the advantages of publishing Exchange via Forefront UAG; planning information; and detailed deployment steps. It is also available online at the Forefront UAG TechCenter (http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd857315.aspx).
systemRequirementsSection: System requirements are available at the Forefront UAG TechCenter (http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd903051.aspx).
